channel.title: Server Help
channel.description: I am trying to join another persons server and I have been playing rsps forever and I have java and everything and it keeps saying "Error Connecting to Server". Please help

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

[quote=“heller1122, post:3, topic:459917”]^Alot of other people have connected already[quote author=extramax link=topic=562824.msg4103099#msg4103099 date=1347724984]
Is The Server Online ? Maybe You’r Friend Havent PortForwarded It Correctly. Thers Some Tutorials in Tutorials *Section About PortForwarding.
[/quote][/quote]

May it be because you’re using a different type of PC/laptop, is the client available for all type all is it a set one; so you may have a Mac but the client is only download able for Windows. If that doesn’t work then, then I don’t even know if this is needed but try downloading JDK.

Read full topic
